com.lpoo.game.model.controllers

Class BuoyancyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.game.model.controllers.BuoyancyController

  • public class BuoyancyController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for handling the buoyancy of fluids.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Set<com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Fixture> fixtures
      Set containing the fixtures that will be generated and associated to the fluid.
      private float fluidDrag
      Fluid's dragging constant.
      private float fluidLift
      Fluid's lifting constant
      private com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Fixture fluidSensor
      Fluid's initial fixture.
      private java.util.List<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2> fluidVertices
      List containing the fluid associated vertices.
      private boolean isFluidFixed
      Boolean if set fluid is fixed.
      private float linearDrag
      Fluid's liner dragging constant
      private float maxFluidDrag
      Fluid's maximum dragging constant
      private float maxFluidLift
      Fluid's maximum lifting constant
      private com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world
      The world the buoyancy controller will be used in.
